hero.title: Shield.js

hero.description: From developers, to developers. Make the beginning easier with all daytools installed in one place.

about.title: We are.... SHIELD.JS
about.subtitle: 🧑‍🎨 Frontend Chapter aka Best Chapter 🏆

description.p1: As you already might know, the Frontend chapter was rebooted in August, just like Spiderman movies. The (re)original team, led by the Javier "The Man" Leal includes NextJS superhero Iván Esteban, React guru Alexis Reina and the rising developer-superstar Andrea Calvo. The Marvel comparisons here are inevitable. The team has been working really hard to give the chapter a big push to recover from the failed start and be at the front-of-the line, where we all expect it to be.
description.p2: Recently, we have been blessed with three new amazing recrutis, the master Jose Manuel Torralvo, the legend Roberto Hernández and the rising star Francisco Molina (a.k.a. Franky).
description.p3: We have been working on this template with so much love 💚 to make the world easier and fancier, so just use it and enjoy it.

about.conclusion: What to say... we are invincible now, we are Shield.JS
